"I'm ssure you're fine my dear, checking on you isn't anything I 
wouldn't do for any of my predacon allies." he looked toward 
Drillbit "Do what you can for the dear wolf, she is a valiant 
fighter, a credit to the predacon cause." 

Phobia decided that he'd played enough games for now, if this was the 
result of Megatrons leadership then it wouldn't take much to get them 
to turn against him.

He remembered his promise to Kluster, he still had a few days to get 
back, a few days is all he should need.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She woke up and saw that Phobia was standing over her.  She raised 
> her head and looked at him. "Is everything OK?"
> She stood up. "I appreciate you checking on me, but I'm fine." she 
> walked over to Drillbit.
> "Do you think my original arm will be in functioning order or too 
> damaged to do anything with?"  She looked at Drillbit with  hope in 
> her eyes.
